referencedStandardType.title: Referenced_ Standard. Details

id.title: Referenced_ Standard. Identification. Identifier
id.description: The identifier of this referenced standard.

versionId.title: Referenced_ Standard. Version. Identifier
versionId.description: The identifier of the version of this referenced standard.

uri.title: Referenced_ Standard. URI. Identifier

typeCode.title: Referenced_ Standard. Type. Code
typeCode.description: The code specifying the type of referenced standard.

uri.title: Specified_ Certification. URI. Identifier
uri.description: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for this specified certification.

responsibleAgency.title: Specified_ Certification. Responsible Agency. Text

endDateTime.description: The end date value for this specified certification.

relatedReferencedStandard.title: Specified_ Certification. Related. Referenced_ Standard

locationType.title: Specified_ Location. Details

typeCode.title: Specified_ Location. Type. Code
typeCode.description: The code specifying the type of this specified location.

description.title: Specified_ Location. Description. Text

name.title: Specified_ Location. Name. Text
name.description: A name, expressed as text, for this specified location.

mapUri.title: Specified_ Location. Map_ URI. Identifier

specifiedTradeAddress.title: Specified_ Location. Specified. Trade_ Address

postcodeCode.title: Trade_ Address. Postcode. Code
postcodeCode.description: A code specifying the postcode of this trade address.

postOfficeBox.title: Trade_ Address. Post Office Box. Text
postOfficeBox.description: The unique identifier, expressed as text, of a container commonly referred to as a box, in a post office or other postal service location, assigned to a person or organization, where postal items may be kept for this trade address.

lineOne.title: Trade_ Address. Line One. Text
lineOne.description: The first free form line, expressed as text, of this trade address.

lineTwo.title: Trade_ Address. Line Two. Text

lineThree.title: Trade_ Address. Line Three. Text
